QM_GPNVG_18_NVGs description:
Ah, you're a night raider? Well, I have equipment just for you. Show your skills and then we can discuss you buying it from me.

IMPORTANT: Each task can only be completed at night (21:00-06:00) and you can't use any flashlights or tactical devices. GPNVG-18 only. Laser devices are fine though.
QM_GPNVG_18_NVGs name: Getting those GPNVG-18 Night Vision goggles
QM_GPNVG_18_NVGs successMessageText: Always a pleasure to help fellow night raider
